title: If it's easy to read...
content:
Song, H. and Schwarz, N. (2010). [If it’s easy to read, it’s easy to do, pretty, good, and true](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108235351/http:/www.thepsychologist.org.uk/archive/archive_home.cfm?volumeID=23&editionID=185&ArticleID=1629). _The Psychologist, 23(2)._ 108–111.

Hot off the press. A great review article discussing the effects of ease of reading on people's decision making. Very well written, plain language and free. One of the better pieces I have come across lately.
author: Chris Dean
